about_the_game:
Dive into an exciting first-person horror adventure. SoloDev by Valezart with Unreal Engine.



You'll be James Ryder, a courageous cowboy whose life shatters when the ruthless Blackwoods gang kills his family. Seeking vengeance, you'll venture into the treacherous mountains where they hide. Yet, as you explore, you'll discover that lurking shadows hold horrors beyond the outlaws. A deadly otherworldly threat has turned reality into nightmares.




Navigate the darkness, guided only by the faint light of your lantern flickering with every gust of wind, while listening to the mountain's sinister whispers. In the midst of the storm, you will only be able to glimpse your way when the lightning rips through the sky and casts ghostly flashes over the outlines of the rocks and twisted trees.




Prepare to face unimaginable horrors that await around every turn. Your only options will be to run, hide, and preserve your sanity. Any attempt to confront these abominations with your useless revolver will only result in certain death. Keep your senses sharp, because in this living nightmare, you'll never discern the hidden terrors until they strike.




Where cinematic storytelling seamlessly meets top-tier production. Delve into a narrative enriched by compelling voice acting, breathtaking visuals, and an original soundtrack, offering a truly immersive gaming adventure that mirrors the artistry of a blockbuster film.




  • Immersive World: Embark on a first-person journey through the dark mountain.
  • Horrifying Nightmares: Escape from deadly threats and heart-pounding jumpscares.
  • Ingenious Puzzles: Solve challenges to progress and reveal hidden mysteries.
  • Jumping Sections: Demonstrate your skill by overcoming obstacles and defying gravity.
  • Cinematic Experience: Live the story as if you were inside an epic film.
  • Original Soundtrack: Dive into a truly unique and atmospheric musical journey.
  • Active Community: Join other players and share experiences.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work due to frequent violence, gore, and general mature content.

short_description: Embark on a spine-chilling first-person horror adventure, exploring a haunting mountain wilderness, as you relentlessly hunt down the outlaws who murdered your family. Uncover hidden mysteries and escape from the grips of unspeakable otherworldly nightmares in this harrowing odyssey.
